page.title: 06LOCAL NEWS STORIES
page.content: More than 200,000 West Sussex folk are getting a poor deal from the B.B.C.with national radio services according to a shock new county council report. School meal charges in West Sussex are now set to increase by 5p. Firemen in West Sussex answered a record 7,510 calls last year,that is nearly 1,000 up from the figure four years ago. Hundreds of West Sussex school children styed at home as 900 teachers took part in the country's largest single day of action in the five month old dispute. Edward William Rogers was fined Â£270 for driving with excess level of alcohol in his blood.
